languages.text: "Вы перестанете быть Вольным Торговцем. Возможно, вообще перестанете быть", {n}— Абеляр предельно серьезен.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, в вашей власти — игнорировать почти кого угодно в Просторе Коронус. Но не Инквизицию. Никогда — не Инквизицию".

traits.locale_text: "Вы перестанете быть Вольным Торговцем. Возможно, вообще перестанете быть", {n}— Абеляр предельно серьезен.{/n} "Ваша светлость, в вашей власти — игнорировать почти кого угодно в Просторе Коронус. Но не Инквизицию. Никогда — не Инквизицию".

languages.text: "You would cease to be a Rogue Trader. And perhaps cease to be altogether," {n}Abelard says gravely.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is your prerogative to disregard anyone you wish in the Koronus Expanse. But not the Inquisition. Never the Inquisition."
languages.original_text: "Вы перестанете быть Вольным Торговцем. Возможно, вообще перестанете быть", {n}— Абеляр предельно серьезен.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, в вашей власти — игнорировать почти кого угодно в Просторе Коронус. Но не Инквизицию. Никогда — не Инквизицию".

traits.locale_text: "You would cease to be a Rogue Trader. And perhaps cease to be altogether," {n}Abelard says gravely.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is your prerogative to disregard anyone you wish in the Koronus Expanse. But not the Inquisition. Never the Inquisition."

"You would cease to be a Rogue Trader. And perhaps cease to be altogether," {n}Abelard says gravely.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is your prerogative to disregard anyone you wish in the Koronus Expanse. But not the Inquisition. Never the Inquisition."

"You would cease to be a Rogue Trader. And perhaps cease to be altogether," {n}Abelard says gravely.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is your prerogative to disregard anyone you wish in the Koronus Expanse. But not the Inquisition. Never the Inquisition."

"You would cease to be a Rogue Trader. And perhaps cease to be altogether," {n}Abelard says gravely.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is your prerogative to disregard anyone you wish in the Koronus Expanse. But not the Inquisition. Never the Inquisition."

languages.text: “您将被剥夺行商浪人的职位，甚至连您的性命都可能会剥夺。”{n}阿贝拉德严肃地回答道。{/n}“大人，您有权对在科罗努斯扩区的任何人置之不理，但千万不能这么对待审判庭。绝对不能惹上审判庭。”
languages.original_text: "You would cease to be a Rogue Trader. And perhaps cease to be altogether," {n}Abelard says gravely.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is your prerogative to disregard anyone you wish in the Koronus Expanse. But not the Inquisition. Never the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: “您将被剥夺行商浪人的职位，甚至连您的性命都可能会剥夺。”{n}阿贝拉德严肃地回答道。{/n}“大人，您有权对在科罗努斯星域的任何人置之不理，但千万不能这么对待审判庭。绝对不能惹上审判庭。”

languages.text: 「あなたはローグトレーダーではなくなります。同時におそらく、存在すらしなくなるでしょう」{n}アベラードは重々しく言う。{/n}「{mf|陛下|陛下}、コロヌス・エクスパンスであなたを望むすべての人を省みぬことはあなたの特権です。ですが、異端審問庁は違います。それは決して、拒めぬものです」
languages.original_text: "You would cease to be a Rogue Trader. And perhaps cease to be altogether," {n}Abelard says gravely.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is your prerogative to disregard anyone you wish in the Koronus Expanse. But not the Inquisition. Never the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたはローグトレーダーではなくなります。同時におそらく、存在すらしなくなるでしょう」{n}アベラードは重々しく言う。{/n}「{mf|陛下|陛下}、コロヌス・エクスパンスであなたを望むすべての人を省みぬことはあなたの特権です。ですが、異端審問庁は違います。それは決して、拒めぬものです」

languages.text: "Dann wärt Ihr nicht länger {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}. Und vielleicht wärt ihr kurz darauf gar nichts mehr", {n}sagt Abelard todernst.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, es ist Euer Recht, ganz nach Wunsch jeden in der Koronus-Ausdehnung zu missachten. Aber nicht die Inquisition. Niemals die Inquisition."
languages.original_text: "You would cease to be a Rogue Trader. And perhaps cease to be altogether," {n}Abelard says gravely.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is your prerogative to disregard anyone you wish in the Koronus Expanse. But not the Inquisition. Never the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: "Dann wärt Ihr nicht länger {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}. Und vielleicht wärt ihr kurz darauf gar nichts mehr", {n}sagt Abelard todernst.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, es ist Euer Recht, ganz nach Wunsch jeden in der Koronus-Ausdehnung zu missachten. Aber nicht die Inquisition. Niemals die Inquisition."

languages.text: « Vous cesseriez d'être {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. Voire même d'être tout court, {n}ajoute Abélard d'un air grave.{/n} Votre Seigneurie, vous êtes parfaitement en droit de ne pas tenir compte de qui que ce soit dans les Étendues de Koronus. Sauf l'Inquisition. Jamais l'Inquisition. »
languages.original_text: "You would cease to be a Rogue Trader. And perhaps cease to be altogether," {n}Abelard says gravely.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is your prerogative to disregard anyone you wish in the Koronus Expanse. But not the Inquisition. Never the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: « Vous cesseriez d'être {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. Voire même d'être tout court, {n}ajoute Abélard d'un air grave.{/n} Votre Seigneurie, vous êtes parfaitement en droit de ne pas tenir compte de qui que ce soit dans les Étendues de Koronus. Sauf l'Inquisition. Jamais l'Inquisition. »

languages.text: «Dejaría de ser Comerciante Independiente. Y quizá de ser {mf|un hombre|una mujer} viv{mf|o|a}». {n}Abelard habla con seriedad.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, está en su derecho de ignorar a quien desee en toda la Extensión de Koronus excepto a la Inquisición. A la Inquisición, nunca».
languages.original_text: "You would cease to be a Rogue Trader. And perhaps cease to be altogether," {n}Abelard says gravely.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is your prerogative to disregard anyone you wish in the Koronus Expanse. But not the Inquisition. Never the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: «Dejaría de ser Comerciante Independiente. Y quizá de ser {mf|un hombre|una mujer} viv{mf|o|a}». {n}Abelard habla con seriedad.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, está en su derecho de ignorar a quien desee en toda la Extensión de Koronus excepto a la Inquisición. A la Inquisición, nunca».

languages.text: "Hür Tacirlik kariyeriniz sona erer. Hatta canınızdan bile olabilirsiniz." {n}Abelard ciddiyetle konuşuyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Koronus Enginliği'nde istediğiniz herkesi göz ardı etme imtiyazınız var. Engizisyon ise bundan müstesna. Engizisyon'u görmezden gelemezsiniz."
languages.original_text: "You would cease to be a Rogue Trader. And perhaps cease to be altogether," {n}Abelard says gravely.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is your prerogative to disregard anyone you wish in the Koronus Expanse. But not the Inquisition. Never the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacirlik kariyeriniz sona erer. Hatta canınızdan bile olabilirsiniz," {n}diyor Abelard ciddiyetle.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Koronus Enginliği'nde istediğiniz herkesi göz ardı etme imtiyazınız var. Engizisyon ise bundan müstesna. Engizisyon'u görmezden gelemezsiniz."
